Item.Name: End Zone Food Court
Item.Content:
End Zone Food Court in Disney's All-Star Sports Resort, Disney's All-Star Sports Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for End Zone Food Court

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001482.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Sack your hunger with a preset line-up of fan favorites—pizza, nachos, hot dogs, smoothies, gelato and more—or create your own burgers and pasta, all while TVs play popular Disney cartoons and sporting events amid ample indoor seating.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

WDWNT Reviews

Item.Name: Grandstand Spirits
Item.Content:
Grandstand Spirits in Disney's All-Star Sports Resort, Disney's All-Star Sports Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Grandstand Spirits

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002209.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Hang loose at this lively bar just 10 toes from the nose of the Surfboard Bay Pool. Bask in a bevy of beverages, including specialty cocktails, frozen drinks, draft beer, sangria and wine.
  Cuisine: American

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!
